data.text: @nycgov You could also make the city remote work focused. Improve internet infrastructure, diversify zoning to convert now unneeded office space to residential to increase mixed use and reduce rents so the city is affordable to live in. Huge impacts on traffic and pollution too!
@Fran_KewGdnsQns @nycgov Oh please… weed is the least of our worries. The things that are messing up our neighborhood is the crimes, not weed
@nycgov The polluting of our public spaces with marijuana smoke isn’t improving our neighborhoods.
@nycgov You did to get crime under control.

@nycgov Covid won’t stop until we stop close contact that spreads the virus! use app Bost instead to safely communicate with people around. Download for free at Apple https://t.co/uChWynVbJG & Google https://t.co/Nvi0yitq3f https://t.co/TdCueJ24zc
